name: interdependently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in such a way that two or more things depend on each other: work interdependently The team members are working more and more interdependently.act interdependently The two substances act interdependently to increase blood pressure. Related word
interdependent
More examplesFewer examplesEach part of the system must be evaluated interdependently with the other parts.The study showed that classroom structures in which students work interdependently often produce dramatic gains.These skills develop interdependently and enhance an individual’s ability to engage in effective planning during adolescence.
